title: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce on a toasted bun.

title: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
description: Crispy chicken breast, spicy mayo, lettuce, tomato, and jalapenos on a baguette.

title: Veggie Delight
description: Mixed greens, roasted vegetables, avocado, and balsamic vinaigrette.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil on a crispy crust.

title: Chicken Quesadilla
description: Shredded chicken, cheese, saut√©ed onions, and bell peppers wrapped in a tortilla and served with salsa.

title: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese tossed in Caesar dressing.

title: Meatball Sub
description: Juicy meatballs, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese on a crusty sub roll.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken in a rich and creamy tomato sauce, served with basmati rice and naan bread.

title: Greek Gyro
description: Sliced lamb and beef, tomato, onion, cucumber, and tzatziki sauce wrapped in a warm pita.

title: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
description: Succulent shrimp, garlic, and parsley in a light and zesty lemon sauce, served with linguine.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
